channel.title: Dialogue/NPC's not updating
channel.description:
This might sound like a really newbie question :palm:
But is there something I have to delete to update NPC Dialogues. I tried changing wording etc of a dialogue for Slayer but instead I broke it (Some how it changed) I then reverted it back to what it is and it hasn't changed in game. I've tried using it with and without an IDE. Do I have to delete something?

item.title: Dialogue/NPC's not updating
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

Okay after trying all that I put a backup txt with class file in and it fixed it but I try and edit it and it doesn’t edit in game? I tried changing the text to see if it was and it just wasn’t. Does anyone know why that is?

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue/NPC's not updating
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I think the problem is here:

Try changing that to

player.setSlayerPoints(player.getSlayerPoints() + ((hasSlayerRing == true) ? 40 : 20));

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue/NPC's not updating
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:547921”][quote author=MikeMike1997 link=topic=666826.msg4458677#msg4458677 date=1416335375]

Can I see the error in eclipse then? because what you just showed me says there’s an existing error (in the code) that needs to be solved.

That was the error in Eclipse

Yes but eclipse should be able to actually see where the root of the error is.
Can you tell me what line is line 62 of SlayerMaster.java?

“if (player.getTask().isComplete()) {”
[/quote]
Is the method isComplete returning a boolean?
If it is, then I’m not seeing any issue with your code…[/quote]
Yes it is. The code was working before, that’s why I’m confused? There’s no config file I have to delete that it remakes or anything?

Read full topic

Is the method isComplete returning a boolean?
If it is, then I’m not seeing any issue with your code…

item.title: Dialogue/NPC's not updating
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:547921”]So if you could tell us what revision your server is, that would help.

It’d also be nice if you posted the code related to your issue.[/quote]
I can’t believe I forgot that… :palm:
It’s a 718

The error in Eclipse IDE. It’s odd because I changed it back, still same problem…

java.lang.Error: Unresolved compilation problem: 
	The left-hand side of an assignment must be a variable

ERROR! THREAD NAME: New I/O  worker #1
	at com.rs.game.player.dialogues.impl.SlayerMaster.run(SlayerMaster.java:62)
	at com.rs.game.player.DialogueManager.continueDialogue(DialogueManager.java:31)
	at com.rs.net.decoders.WorldPacketsDecoder.processPackets(WorldPacketsDecoder.java:1105)
	at com.rs.net.decoders.WorldPacketsDecoder.decode(WorldPacketsDecoder.java:279)
	at com.rs.net.ServerChannelHandler.messageReceived(ServerChannelHandler.java:100)
	at org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelHandler.handleUpstream(SimpleChannelHandler.java:95)
	at org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.sendUpstream(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:563)
	at org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.sendUpstream(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:558)
	at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.fireMessageReceived(Channels.java:268)
	at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.fireMessageReceived(Channels.java:255)
	at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioWorker.read(NioWorker.java:91)
	at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.AbstractNioWorker.processSelectedKeys(AbstractNioWorker.java:373)
	at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.AbstractNioWorker.run(AbstractNioWorker.java:247)
	at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioWorker.run(NioWorker.java:35)
	at org.jboss.netty.util.ThreadRenamingRunnable.run(ThreadRenamingRunnable.java:102)
	at org.jboss.netty.util.internal.DeadLockProofWorker$1.run(DeadLockProofWorker.java:42)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
			} else if (componentId == OPTION_4) {
				if (player.getTask().getCurrentTask() > 0) {
					sendEntityDialogue(IS_NPC, "Kuradal", 9085, 9827, "You still have remaining:", "x"+player.getTask().getTaskAmount()+" "+player.getTask().getName()+"");
					stage = 1;
				} else {
					if (player.getTask().isComplete()) {
						sendEntityDialogue(IS_NPC, "Kuradal", 9085, 9827, "Very good! Have some slayer points!", "You can now set a new task.");
						boolean hasSlayerRing = player.getEquipment().getRingId() == 13281;
						player.setSlayerPoints(player.getSlayerPoints() + (hasSlayerRing == true ? 40 : 20));
						player.getTask().resetTask();
						stage = 1;
					} else {
						sendEntityDialogue(IS_NPC, "Kuradal", 9085, 9827, "You do not currently have a task.");
						stage = 1;
					}
				}

Read full topic
